actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to establish the Northern Yukon-Arctic International Wildlife Refuge.
short_title: Northern Yukon-Arctic International Wildlife Refuge Act

summary.text: Northern Yukon-Arctic International Wildlife Refuge Act - Establishes, as an international wildlife refuge area between the United States and Canada, the Northern Yukon-Arctic International Wildlife Refuge which shall include the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge. Sets forth conditions with respect to the establishment of the refuge. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Northern Yukon-Arctic International Wildlife Refuge Act
A bill to establish the Northern Yukon-Arctic International Wildlife Refuge.
